name: Berry and Davies Electrical Ltd
tag_list: electricians, pat-testing, home-automation-service, commercial-electrical, industrial-electrical-work, rewires, electricians-experts, electrical-contractor, worcester, cheltenham, ross-on-wye, united-kingdom
overview: Berry & Davies electrical contractors are based in Hereford offer reliable electrical installation work with PAT Testing and full home automation services. We commonly install electrical systems and wiring in new structures and rewires buildings that are being rebuilt. In many situations if your electrical system deteriorated, we can properly handle any electrical problems you have. Our services cover Cheltenham, Ledbury, Gloucester, Ross-On-Wye, Leominster and Worcester regions. Our Electricians in Hereford provide reliable and customer friendly services. If you want to know more about our professional electrician services contact us today.

offices.address1: Unit 216B, Holmer Trading Estate, College Road
